name: TurboTax Canada 2024 Tax Return
summary: A TT24 file is a tax return file created by TurboTax Canada 2024, a tax preparation software for filing Canadian federal and provincial taxes. It contains user-entered tax data, including income details, deductions, credits, and other financial information needed to complete a 2024 tax return. TT24 files function similarly to .TAX2024 files, which the U.S. version of TurboTax 2024 creates to save tax returns.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
